title: Tom Pidcock’s Limited Cyclocross Program Due to ‘Bigger Goals,’ Says Coach Bogaerts
content:
2022 world champion ‘highly likely’ to miss worlds, will square up against Mathieu van der Poel and Wout van Aert in as few as four events.

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock’s Limited Cyclocross Program Due to ‘Bigger Goals,’ Says Coach Bogaerts on Velo.
author: sstokes
